Featured Work

UI DESIGN

For this project I used a png file to create this user interface for web usage. This demonstrates my ability to build a pixel perfect user interface.

Check out the code

ESPN'S API

Using ESPN's API and Backbone I was able to create a web app that displays the top 10 headlines for each NBA team. The headlines are updated automatically based on ESPN's current NBA headlines.

Check out the code

WORDPRESS

I currently control the upkeep of 6 Dan Waldschmidt WordPress sites. Dan is a well known business strategist, popular speaker and ultra-runner located in Greenville, SC.

Dan's Blog

BACKBONE APP

Using Backbone I was able to create this web app in 2.5 weeks. The app is a 100 square Super Bowl game designed for users to compete based on the scores of the football game.

Check out the code

About Me

Hello, my name is Tyler Huston. I am a Front-End Developer and Designer. I am currently located in Greenville, SC. I have a B.A. in Visual Communications from the University of South Carolina and most recently attended The Iron Yard Academy advancing my skills in web app development. Feel free to contact me with any thoughts or questions!
